item.title: VSCO 首次推出带流行照片滤镜的独立 iPhone 相机应用程序
item.description:
Capture 加入了越来越多的应用程序行列，这些应用程序被定位为 Apple iPhone 相机软件的替代品。【原文：

Capture joins a growing group of apps positioned as alternatives to Apple’s iPhone camera software.

】

item.title: <strong>穆拉提的 "思维机器 "公司以 100 亿美元估值筹集现金</strong
item.description:
Andreessen Horowitz、Accel 和 Conviction Partners 对这位前 OpenAI 高管的初创公司进行了投资。【原文：

Andreessen Horowitz, Accel and Conviction Partners have invested in the former OpenAI executive’s startup.

】

item.title: 美联储将在银行审查中消除声誉风险
item.description: 美联储周一表示，将不再把声誉风险作为银行审查的一部分。【原文：The Federal Reserve said Monday it will no longer consider reputation risk as part of its bank exams.】

item.title: 前索罗斯对冲基金选股人孙正义领导安登进军美国市场
item.description: 投资公司 Andon Hong Kong Ltd. 将在纽约开设办事处，由索罗斯基金管理公司（Soros Fund Management）校友 Chuck Sun 领导。【原文：Investment firm Andon Hong Kong Ltd. is opening an office in New York, led by Soros Fund Management alumnus Chuck Sun.】

item.title: 美国众议院禁止工作人员的政府设备使用 WhatsApp
item.description: Meta 的 WhatsApp 消息平台已被列入禁止美国国会众议院工作人员在政府配发的设备上使用的应用程序名单，此举是出于对该应用程序数据安全性的担忧。【原文：Meta’s WhatsApp messaging platform has been added to a list of apps banned from government-issued devices for congressional staffers in the US House of Representatives, a move driven by concerns about the app’s data security.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势升级，美国信贷风险指数波动不定
item.description: 周一，衡量美国信贷风险的一个关键指标在涨跌之间波动，在卡塔尔表示拦截了来自伊朗、以美国军事基地为目标的导弹，但未造成人员伤亡之后，美国信贷风险有所收紧。【原文：A key gauge of US credit risk fluctuated between gains and losses on Monday, tightening after Qatar said it intercepted missiles from Iran targeting a US military base, without any casualties.】

item.title: 超微公司寻求发行 20 亿美元可转换债券，交易不断增加
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. is raising $2 billion from the sale of convertible bonds, extending a dramatic run of companies tapping the resurgent market to secure cheap capital.】

item.title: CityFibre 将获得近 20 亿英镑用于光纤铺设
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，CityFibre 即将达成一项协议，获得约 20 亿英镑（约合 27 亿美元）的新资金，这将有助于该光纤公司继续运营并扩大其业务范围。【原文：CityFibre is nearing an agreement for about £2 billion ($2.7 billion) in fresh capital in a round that will help the fiber company continue operating and expand its reach, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华为的历史说明了现代世界的许多问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国页岩油生产商不太可能响应特朗普的钻井号召，因为涨势已经消退
item.description: 美国页岩油生产商不太可能听从唐纳德-特朗普总统 "钻吧，宝贝，钻吧 "的最新号召，因为他们会优先考虑对冲而不是提高产量，以应对美国对伊朗的军事打击。【原文：US shale oil producers are unlikely to heed President Donald Trump’s latest call to “Drill, Baby, Drill” as they prioritize hedging over ramping up production in response to US military strikes on Iran.】

item.title: 特朗普、DOGE 政策转变加剧美国国家预算创伤
item.description: 美国各州正在敲响警钟，因为在特朗普政府大规模削减政府开支及其贸易政策的影响下，他们将损失数十亿美元的收入。【原文：US states are sounding the alarm over the billions in revenue they stand to lose under the Trump administration’s broadscale government cuts and the impact of his trade policies.】

item.title: Grifols 案显示其向与家族有关联的实体支付了更多血浆费用
item.description: 根据监管机构在法庭案件中提交的调查结果，西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 向与其控股家族有关联的实体购买血浆的价格高于向第三方供应商购买血浆的价格。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA paid a higher price to buy blood plasma from an entity linked to its controlling family than from third-party suppliers, according to a regulator’s findings submitted in a court case.】

item.title: 美国仍在商谈为安哥拉铁路走廊拨款5亿美元的事宜
item.description: 美国国际开发金融公司（US International Development Finance Corp. ）仍在为洛比托走廊（Lobito corridor）的 5 亿多美元融资做最后敲定，该铁路项目将把非洲中部铜矿带的重要矿产运往安哥拉的大西洋港口。【原文：The US International Development Finance Corp. is still finalizing more than $500 million in financing for the Lobito corridor, a railway project that will haul critical minerals from central Africa’s copper belt to an Atlantic port in Angola.】

item.title: 巴西霜冻风险加深，阿拉比卡咖啡飙升
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货创下两周多来的最大涨幅，在上周大跌后出现反弹，原因是头号种植国巴西面临寒冷天气。【原文：Arabica coffee futures jumped by the most in more than two weeks, rebounding after last week’s selloff as top grower Brazil faces cold weather.】

item.title: 美国轰炸伊朗后油轮费率飙升至 2023 年以来最高点
item.description: 油轮运价涨幅扩大，原因是中东紧张局势加剧，美国上周末对伊朗发动打击后，船东要求提高在波斯湾港口停靠的费用。【原文：Tanker rates extended gains as tensions in the Middle East ratchet higher, with shipowners demanding bigger fees to call at ports in the Persian Gulf after the US launched strikes on Iran over the weekend.】

item.title: 恩布里奇公司希望为墨西哥湾沿岸石油流增加管道空间
item.description: Enbridge Inc. 和合作伙伴 Energy Transfer LP 正在评估伊利诺伊州对增加管道容量的兴趣，这将为美国墨西哥湾沿岸市场输送更多原油。【原文：Enbridge Inc. and partner Energy Transfer LP are gauging interest in increased pipeline capacity in Illinois that would carry more crude to markets on the US Gulf Coast.】

item.title: 纳格尔称，鉴于高度不确定性，欧洲央行无法对利率做出承诺
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，鉴于美国贸易政策和中东局势给前景蒙上了阴影，欧洲中央银行不应该承诺一定的利率路径。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t commit to a certain interest-rate path, given how US trade policy and the situation in the Middle East are clouding the outlook, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 肉类巨头 JBS 计划在美国上市后首次出售债券以延长债务期限
item.description: JBS NV 准备在美国上市后首次出售债券，因为这家全球最大的肉类生产商正寻求延长其债务的到期日。【原文：JBS NV is preparing to sell bonds for the first time after its US listing as the world’s largest meat producer seeks to extend maturities on its debt.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 在与债权人达成协议后计划破产
item.description: Wolfspeed 公司计划在 7 月 1 日前申请破产，并达成一项协议，将其债务削减约 46 亿美元，并将控制权移交给可转换票据持有人。【原文：Wolfspeed Inc. is planning to file for bankruptcy by July 1 with a deal to slash its debt by about $4.6 billion and hand over control to convertible noteholders.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，石油巨头缩减伊拉克员工人数
item.description: 随着伊拉克地区紧张局势的升级，英国石油公司（BP Plc）、道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和埃尼公司（Eni SpA）已经减少了伊拉克油田的工作人员，以防万一。【原文：BP Plc, TotalEnergies SE and Eni SpA have reduced staff at oil fields in Iraq as a precaution, as tensions escalate in the region.】

item.title: 纽约市高温引发停电，气温飙升给美国电网带来压力
item.description: 酷热让美国东半部地区的电网不堪重负，导致纽约市皇后区部分地区停电，当地电力公司发出了节约用电的警告。【原文：Blistering heat is straining power grids across the eastern half of the US, leading to a blackout in part of New York City’s borough of Queens as the local utility issued a warning to conserve electricity.】

item.title: AIB 首席执行官称，尽管贸易和中东局势存在不确定性，但市场依然平静
item.description: 爱尔兰最大银行的负责人表示，鉴于全球贸易动荡和中东紧张局势加剧所带来的不确定性，市场 "异常平静"。【原文：Markets are “extraordinarily calm” given the scale of the uncertainty surrounding global trade turmoil and increasing tensions in the Middle East, according to the head of Ireland’s biggest bank.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 增加短期债务工具以拓宽资金来源
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金推出了首个商业票据计划，为其工具包增添了一种新的短期债务工具，以寻求实现资本来源多元化并支持王国经济改革的支出。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund introduced its first commercial paper program, adding a new short-term debt instrument to its toolkit as it seeks to diversify sources of capital and back spending on the kingdom’s economic overhaul.】

item.title: 机器人顾问公司 Wealthfront 秘密申请上市
item.description: 机器人顾问公司Wealthfront秘密提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请，这是一个信号，表明在经历了长期的沉寂之后，将有更多的金融科技公司上市。【原文：The robo-advisory firm Wealthfront filed confidentially for a US initial public offering, a signal that more financial-technology firms are set to go public after a protracted lull.】

item.title: 战略部自 11 月以来第二小规模购买比特币
item.description: 过去七天里，Strategy 公司购买了 2,600 万美元的比特币，这是迈克尔-赛勒领导的数字资产财务公司自半年多前加大加密货币购买力度以来宣布的第二小的周度购买量。【原文：Strategy bought $26 million of Bitcoin over the past seven days, the second-smallest weekly acquisition announced by the Michael Saylor-led digital-asset treasury company since he ramped up its cryptocurrency purchases more than six months ago.】

item.title: 印美有望在七月达成贸易协议，但挑战依然存在
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的官员称，印度和美国都希望在7月9日美国提高关税的最后期限到来之前早日达成贸易协议，但挑战依然存在。【原文：India and the US are keen to clinch an early trade deal before the July 9 deadline, when higher US tariffs are set to kick in, but challenges remain, according to an official familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卖出地缘政治热点再次成为石油交易的制胜法宝
item.description: 原油周一的大幅飙升和回落只是交易商因地缘政治风险而抛售的最新例证，再次显示了原油 "褪去涨势 "是如何赚钱的。【原文：Oil’s whiplash spike and retreat on Monday is only the latest example of traders selling into geopolitical risks, showing yet again how there’s money to be made by “fading the rally” in crude.】

item.title: 爱尔兰监管机构警告不要屈服于银行规则压力
item.description: 爱尔兰银行业最高监管者警告说，有必要坚持高标准的金融监管，尤其是在贸易战、地缘政治紧张局势和对全球经济增长的担忧导致放松金融监管的压力日益增大的今天。【原文：Ireland’s top banking supervisor warned of a need to stick with high standards of financial regulation particularly now when there is increasing pressure to ease them amid trade wars, geopolitical tensions and fears for global growth.】

item.title: 军用卫星制造商 Iceye 探索首次公开募股，销售额有望翻番
item.description: 芬兰一家卫星初创公司受益于欧洲军费开支的增长，预计今年的销售额将翻一番，并正在探索首次公开募股。【原文：A Finnish satellite startup that’s benefiting from Europe’s military spending boom expects to double sales this year and is exploring an initial public offering.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称重新审视关键资本缓冲的 "时机已到
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）警告说，目前的杠杆比率要求方法已导致市场出现意想不到的后果，同时她还补充说，她可能会支持最快在 7 月份降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman warned the current approach to leverage ratio requirements has led to unintended consequences in the market while adding she could support lowering interest rates as soon as July.】
